name: My Pets For Kid (Full Version)
description:
Our collection comprises four games with different themes: Looking for Animals, Dinosaur World, Fairy Tales and Legends and Pets. Various versions exists (with in-app purchases, as a complete version or in a bundle).

HELP AND SUPPORT
Please feel free to contact us through the game's "Settings" menu or on our website www.find-them-all.com or our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/FindThemAll!
